Class IdolDamagedByUnitEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alvarpq.GOTF.coreGame.event.Event
      • com.alvarpq.GOTF.coreGame.event.IdolDamagedByUnitEvent

  • public class IdolDamagedByUnitEvent
extends Event
    For handling when idols are damaged by units.

        Instantiates a new UnitDamagedByUnitEvent.
        Parameters:
        damagedRow - the row of the damaged idol
        damagedSide - the side of the damaged Idol
        damager - the unit that dealt the damage
        amount - the amount of damage dealt
        mySide - the side of the event receiver
        opponentsSide - the opponents side of the event receiver
